title: DATS publication schema
description: A (digital) document made available by a publisher.

title.description: A  digital document made available by a publisher.

type.description: type of publication type, delegated to an external vocabulary/resource

date.description: a property to specify the date of the publication

author.description: a property to specify the person(s) responsible for the publication

acknowledges.description: a property to specify the grant(s) which funded and supported the work reported by the publication

cites.description: a property to specify a reference to a dataset or publication

license.description: a property used to specify to the terms of use of the publication
